Question: Asher did not like Klein; he resigned of his own accord and offered to manage this person, to which this person agreed.
Hints: Isaac **** later rose to become Dean of the UNC School of Medicine from 1964 to 1971.
In July 1969 this person headlined a six-night stand at The Troubadour in Los Angeles.
This person commented "I heard him shot—five, just as quick as you could pull the trigger, about five explosions".
